content.en: Hypergeometric algorithms: Researchers have developed algorithms to address various research questions in the field of hypergeometric functions. These algorithms, such as Zeilberger's algorithm and Gosper's algorithm, are used to find recurrence equations for definite sums of hypergeometric terms. Other algorithms, like the Multiplicative normal form and extraction algorithm, are used to extract rational parts from the product of consecutive values of a rational function. These algorithms play a crucial role in solving complex mathematical problems and advancing our understanding of hypergeometric functions.
content.da: Hypergeometriske algoritmer: Forskere har udviklet algoritmer for at tackle forskellige forskningsspørgsmål inden for hypergeometriske funktioner. Disse algoritmer, såsom Zeilbergers algoritme og Gospers algoritme, bruges til at finde rekursionsligninger for bestemte summer af hypergeometriske termer. Andre algoritmer, som den multiplikative normalform og ekstraktionsalgoritme, bruges til at udtrække rationale dele fra produktet af på hinanden følgende værdier af en rational funktion. Disse algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i løsningen af komplekse matematiske problemer og i fremme af vores forståelse af hypergeometriske funktioner.
